sentences.sContent: The second brother became a bricklayer.
After he left school, he tried his hand at a variety of jobs–bricklayer, cinema usher, coal man.
sentences.sContent_eng: After he left school, he tried his hand at a variety of jobs–bricklayer, cinema usher, coal man.
sentences.sCn: 毕业后，他尝试过各种各样的工作，从瓦匠到电影院的招待，再到煤矿工人。

remMethod.val: brick(砖) + lay(铺设) + er → 铺砖的人 → 砖匠

trans.tranOther: someone whose job is to build walls, buildings etc with bricks
